title: Zilean's going blind in his old age, so sometimes you gotta help him out with bomb placement

replies.body: http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/thats-good.gif
I've tried something similar with my friend. Malz and Kench. He gives space aids to a minion and Kench chucks the minion at the team.
That's almost literally biological warfare...
So this the triple threat, {{champion:90}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:26}}
oh good lord... kench spitting a minion with both space aids and time bombs... the horror https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CKo7mXLUMAALiJG.png
malz main here. Can confirm that this is so cancerous it's worse than aids.
I would like to believe that this is because AIDS are not cancerous?

Trust me it is. Your immune system gets so beaten up that it can't stop all the new cancer cells it would've stopped if you were healthy. Tbh you would be surprised how much full of cancer is everybody every day; props to leukocytes for handling that!

Oh, and allow me to nitpick:

> [{quoted}](name=bill84,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8KAYAFHA,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-04-10T22:32:27.332+0000)
>
>AIDS **is** not cancerous?

The S in AIDS stands for syndrome, which means it's actually singular. {{champion:99}} 

_...flies away..._
Oh, poor minions. At least someone is more abused than supports.
As a masochistic support main I'm jealous.
Works with Sion and Malz 2.
The Kalista ult Kench combo is fucking hilarious too

I want to try this now... DAMNIT!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
That was one explosive appetite Kench has.

lol.

Who got the kill, Tahm or Zil?
Tahm

I wonder why? The damage was still Zilean's. I would think first would be applied damage from the spit then damage of the bomb. Unless Fiddle was actually killed by the spit itself with bomb or without.

EDIT: Thanks for answers, I looked at it again properly and you're all right. The bomb exploded before minion landed. I suppose minion is invulnerable until landing (so it survived the bomb and traveled very very miniature way further), then hit and made splash.

I suspect the Zil bomb went off first and then Tahm's W AoE damage applied?

Maybe.
if zillean got the kill, the bomb killed fiddle, idk which damage was applied first

That would be my guess. They were *really* close.
Hence the question.

The reason why Tahm got the kill is the damage from his Devour, the creep death caused the bomb to explode to damage Janna. 

Possibly?

It looks like Zil bomb timed out right before the minion hit. Had the minion hit, then bomb exploded, I would assume Zil would've gotten the kill, or if the minion died, hence procing the explosion, Zil would've gotten it. 

It does appear to explode early, which is why Kench got the kill, I think

To me it looks like both hit at the same time because Fiddle walked right back into the line of fire which caused aoe from both to go off.

Because if you look at the splash from the devour you will see a chunk of the time bomb flying off at the same time the splash happens.
rhyme, was it intentional or no.

No.
Didn't even notice it until you posted.
Now that's what I call teamwork.
That is amazing. That tahm felt so skilled at that moment
That tahm is DTN, the poster
That random galio ult though.....
with {{champion:223}} i ate an allied {{champion:9}} while he was using his drain, the drain still worked while he was in the belly... i wanted the kill =/

TK is a great way to remove literally every downside of fiddle's kit. basically, he ults in, dumps his cc, targets an enemy with drain, then you eat him and get the aura and the tether, so he can still move (by proxy) and he can't be cc'd out of drain.

lucy <3 TK 
http://ww3.sinaimg.cn/large/006f8wK2gw1ezr8b5org5g308906s4qq.gif
Tahm if honestly league's biggest playmaker
You forgot {{champion:134}}  can throw minions/jungle camps too!
Hey! just wanted to thank you for helping clear up confusion with me earlier! (I had the post about the guy harassing me)
So would the ultimate cancer team (for this category of disease) be Tahm top, Malz mid, Sion jung, Kal ADC, and Zil support?
How about Tristana ADC?
Looking at it again I like Trist better for it unless you swap and have Zil top. No point in using Kal with that lineup without Tahm as her support.
{{champion:14}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:82}} rekt
I imagine this works with Syndra as well. Must experiment.
It does work with basically any reposition / knock backs in the game.
this can also be done with sion
Teamwork makes the Dreamwork...I'll leave now.
Shrek ever after
Damn that's awesome combo
Wow that's a cool combo.
